<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// forest of trees with roots at the bottom of the schedule branching upward.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A node&#39;s SubtreeID is set to itself when it is visited to indicate that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is the root of a subtree. Later it is set to its parent to indicate an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// interior node. Finally, it is set to a representative subtree ID during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// finalization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NodeData &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// DFS results for each SUnit in this DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;NodeData&gt; DFSNodeData;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store per-tree data indexed on tree ID,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;TreeData, 16&gt; DFSTreeData;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each subtree discovered during DFS, record its connections to other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subtrees.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;SmallVector&lt;Connection, 4&gt;&gt; SubtreeConnections;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Cache the current connection level of each subtree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This mutable array is updated during scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt; SubtreeConnectLevels;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Clear the results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheddfsresult/#a4ea487aa2ae12cc1f0bf755bda17546a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheddfsresult/#a4ea487aa2ae12cc1f0bf755bda17546a">clear</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the connection level of a subtree.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For bottom-up trees, the connection level is the latency depth (in cycles)</span></CodeLine>
